p: NPK + Mg increased yield of turmeric compared with NPK alone, likely due to the complementary effect of NPK and MgO fertilizers. [ 36] reported that secondary nutrients also play important roles in producing higher yields of turmeric. Also, [ 37] recommended high application rates of secondary nutrients, i.e., Mg at 22 kg ha −1 and Sulphur at 44 kg ha −1, and a recommended dose of NPK fertilizer for improved yield of turmeric.
